verses.verse: Then I lifted <S%H5375><s%> up my eyes <S%H5869><s%> again <S%H7725><s%> and looked, <S%H7200><s%> and behold, <S%H2009><s%> [there was] a flying <S%H5774><s%> scroll. <S%H4039><s%>

And he said <S%H559><s%> to me, "What <S%H4100><s%> do you see <S%H7200><s%>?" And I answered, <S%H559><s%> "I see <S%H7200><s%> a flying <S%H5774><s%> scroll; <S%H4039><s%> its length <S%H753><s%> is twenty <S%H6242><s%> cubits <S%H520><s%> and its width <S%H7341><s%> ten <S%H6235><s%> cubits. <S%H520><s%>"

Then he said <S%H559><s%> to me, "This <S%H2088><s%> is the curse <S%H423><s%> that is going <S%H3318><s%> forth <S%H3318><s%> over <S%H5921><s%> the face <S%H6440><s%> of the whole <S%H3605><s%> land; <S%H776><s%> surely <S%H3588><s%> everyone <S%H3605><s%> who steals <S%H1589><s%> will be purged <S%H5352><s%> away according to the writing on one <S%H2088><s%> side, <S%H2088><s%> and everyone <S%H3605><s%> who swears <S%H7650><s%> will be purged <S%H5352><s%> away according to the writing on the other side. <S%H2088><s%>

"I will make it go <S%H3318><s%> forth, <S%H3318><s%>" declares <S%H5002><s%> the Lord <S%H3068><s%> of hosts, <S%H6635><s%> "and it will enter <S%H935><s%> the house <S%H1004><s%> of the thief <S%H1590><s%> and the house <S%H1004><s%> of the one who swears <S%H7650><s%> falsely <S%H8267><s%> by My name; <S%H8034><s%> and it will spend <S%H3885><s%> the night <S%H3885><s%> within <S%H8432><s%> that house <S%H1004><s%> and consume <S%H3615><s%> it with its timber <S%H6086><s%> and stones. <S%H68><s%>"

Then the angel <S%H4397><s%> who was speaking <S%H1696><s%> with me went <S%H3318><s%> out, and said <S%H559><s%> to me, "Lift <S%H5375><s%> up now <S%H4994><s%> your eyes, <S%H5869><s%> and see <S%H7200><s%> what <S%H4100><s%> this <S%H2088><s%> is, going <S%H3318><s%> forth. <S%H3318><s%>"

And I said, <S%H559><s%> "What <S%H4100><s%> is it?" And he said, <S%H559><s%> "This <S%H2088><s%> is the ephah <S%H374><s%> going <S%H3318><s%> forth. <S%H3318><s%>" Again he said, <S%H559><s%> "This <S%H2088><s%> is their appearance <S%H5869><s%> in all <S%H3605><s%> the land <S%H776><s%>

(and behold, <S%H2009><s%> a lead <S%H5777><s%> cover <S%H3603><s%> was lifted <S%H5375><s%> up); and this <S%H2088><s%> is a woman <S%H802><s%> sitting <S%H3427><s%> inside <S%H8432><s%> the ephah. <S%H374><s%> "

Then he said, <S%H559><s%> "This <S%H2088><s%> is Wickedness! <S%H7564><s%>" And he threw <S%H7993><s%> her down <S%H7993><s%> into the middle <S%H8432><s%> of the ephah <S%H374><s%> and cast <S%H7993><s%> the lead <S%H5777><s%> weight <S%H68><s%> on its opening. <S%H6310><s%>

Then I lifted <S%H5375><s%> up my eyes <S%H5869><s%> and looked, <S%H7200><s%> and there two <S%H8147><s%> women <S%H802><s%> were coming <S%H3318><s%> out with the wind <S%H7307><s%> in their wings; <S%H3671><s%> and they had wings <S%H3671><s%> like the wings <S%H3671><s%> of a stork, <S%H2624><s%> and they lifted <S%H5375><s%> up the ephah <S%H374><s%> between <S%H996><s%> the earth <S%H776><s%> and the heavens. <S%H8064><s%>
And I said <S%H559><s%> to the angel <S%H4397><s%> who was speaking <S%H1696><s%> with me, "Where <S%H575><s%> are they taking <S%H1980><s%> the ephah <S%H374><s%>?"

Then he said <S%H559><s%> to me, "To build <S%H1129><s%> a temple <S%H1004><s%> for her in the land <S%H776><s%> of Shinar; <S%H8152><s%> and when it is prepared, <S%H3559><s%> she will be set <S%H5117><s%> there <S%H8033><s%> on her own pedestal. <S%H4350><s%>"
